steps.title: Add
steps.sub_title: Provide the command and a description for it.
steps.icon:
<svg class="text-white fill-current w-8" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor">
  <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-11a1 1 0 10-2 0v2H7a1 1 0 100 2h2v2a1 1 0 102 0v-2h2a1 1 0 100-2h-2V7z" clip-rule="evenodd" />
</svg>

steps.title: Colorize
steps.sub_title: Select a color for the command and save it.
steps.icon:
<svg class="text-white fill-current w-8" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor">
  <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 2a2 2 0 00-2 2v11a3 3 0 106 0V4a2 2 0 00-2-2H4zm1 14a1 1 0 100-2 1 1 0 000 2zm5-1.757l4.9-4.9a2 2 0 000-2.828L13.485 5.1a2 2 0 00-2.828 0L10 5.757v8.486zM16 18H9.071l6-6H16a2 2 0 012 2v2a2 2 0 01-2 2z" clip-rule="evenodd" />
</svg>

steps.title: Saved
steps.sub_title: The command is now saved successfully.
steps.icon:
<svg class="text-white fill-current w-8" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor">
  <path d="M5.5 16a3.5 3.5 0 01-.369-6.98 4 4 0 117.753-1.977A4.5 4.5 0 1113.5 16h-8z" />
</svg>

steps.title: Get it back!
steps.sub_title: You can now access it anywhere in the world.
